root.name: Fort Zombie
root.description: System RequirementsOperating system: Windows XP SP2 / Windows Vista / Windows 7Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 6600 or equivalentMemory: 2GB of RAMHard Drive: 1GB free hard drive spaceVideo Card: DirectX 9.0c SM2 compliant graphics card with 512M of RAM minimumSound Card: DirectX-compatibleDirectX: 9.0c
